Title: Tour of the Dark Land
Credits: Story by Max Schwab; code by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Palace.Body: Palace of the Lord. Abode of the Dark Empress and capital city of the Aeternum Empire

Deepwoods.Body: The mysterious Deepwoods. The ground plummets yet trees grow ever taller. Spiders' holy songs carry from within

Port.Body: The bustling Port town greets you. A hub of commerce and culture, but someting ominous waits in the shadows.

Wall.Body: A great wall crests across the horizon marrying mountain to sea. It's imposing silhouette is marred by a gaping wound in its chest. What creature could have done this?

Plains.Body: Great plains of grass, animals, and rubble of kingdoms past.

Fortress.Body: A stern fortress nestled in the mountain range, the only way through. It's walls are cold and impenetrable, or so you hope.

Beyond.Body: Beyond lies the enemy. You're not ready, Leichra.
